Alg-ExisAn-Exis1ou-EpalExParam-SectEx1: %# Database File : Alg-ExisAn-Exis1ou-EpalExParam-SectEx1\qt_endl%@ Database source: b_gymnasiou\qt_endlΔίνεται η εξίσωση \[ (3\lambda-1)x-\lambda x+5=5\lambda x-12 \]\qt_endlόπου $ \lambda\in\mathbb{R} $.
